timeline.title: EVIDENCE_HANDLING
timeline.note: Alleged listen/delete of July Call by OIC (time placeholder; confirm exact time)

timeline.title: DATA_BREACH
timeline.note: Unredacted internal email forwarded externally (time placeholder — confirm exact time from headers)

timeline.title: HOME_VISIT_NO_BWV
timeline.note: Exact date/time TBD — use email/calendar/sms to pin down.

timeline.title: SUICIDE_ATTEMPT
timeline.note: Referenced in call as occurring on 06-04-2025.

timeline.title: SUICIDE_LOGGED
timeline.note: In-call confirmation that the suicide was logged on 17-04-2025.

timeline.title: CALL_101
timeline.note: Holiday Alibi call documents chain-of-command leave & July–Nov mismatch

timeline.title: OIC_IDENTIFIED
timeline.note: OIC named as PC Jonathan Dixon

timeline.title: CHAIN_ON_LEAVE
timeline.note: OIC Dixon + Sgt Duffy + Insp Palmer all on leave until Tuesday

timeline.title: STATUS_CONFLICT
timeline.note: Caller says July case closed; handler says under investigation

timeline.title: ACCESS_BARRIER
timeline.note: Handler declines to provide details; promises email escalation; advises 999 for emergencies

timeline.title: CALL_COMPLAINTS
timeline.note: Call with Sussex Police Complaints; confirms live case is July reference; suicide log delay noted.

timeline.title: MEETING_FLAGGED
timeline.note: Veritas + police meeting referenced as 'Wednesday at 2pm'.

timeline.title: CALL_101_NOTE_LEFT
timeline.note: Name + DOB used to leave note without crime number

timeline.title: 101 Call — 'No Crime Number' Strategy
timeline.note: Handler (Ayrton 42755) agrees to leave note for OIC using name + DOB; no crime reference provided.

timeline.title: CALL_101_OIC_DISCLOSED
timeline.note: OIC name(s) provided for multiple crime refs

timeline.title: 101 Call — 'No Crime Number' Strategy
timeline.summary: Handler (Ayrton 42755) agrees to leave note for OIC using name + DOB; no crime reference provided.

events.title: Box Office Requests Private Booker Data from Half a Camel
events.summary: Brighton Fringe Box Office asked for direct audience contact details from venue system, creating GDPR risk and contradicting manager agreement.
